CustomField.description: If a date field in another record should be set when this letter is sent or received, then enter the field name here (for example, Date_declined__c or Date_closed__c).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If a date field in another record should be set when this letter is sent or received, then enter the field name here (for example, Date_declined__c or Date_closed__c).
CustomField.label: Date sent/recd field name
